column4: Hello all, I am trying to get a tv tuner card to work, forums helped just about enough to get the tuner working. can see a very good picture. but no sound.
maybe you need to plug in a cable for sound?
maybe the soundcard inline is muted or your TV tool uses to wrong engine
see for yourself. I cant understand much of the dmesg output. but i suspect something about the audio is missing here :S
